function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete coverage of key aspects like health care, epidemiology, and frontline workers in existing COVID-19 knowledge graphs","Impact":"Limited ability to provide comprehensive understanding of COVID-19 and hindered efforts to combat the epidemic","Mitigation":"Expand the scope of COVID-19 knowledge graphs to include essential aspects like health care, epidemiology, and frontline workers","Technologies":"Neo4j database, linked data, open-source tools","People":"Researchers, public health professionals, frontline workers","Owner":"OpenKG, CovidGraph project"},{"Description":"Limited diversity of topics covered in existing COVID-19 knowledge graphs","Impact":"Reduced usefulness of knowledge for the public and limited ability to capture a comprehensive range of COVID-19 topics","Mitigation":"Extend the coverage of COVID-19 knowledge graphs to include diverse topics such as health, prevention, and goods","Technologies":"Linked data, open-source tools","People":"Public, researchers, public health professionals","Owner":"OpenKG, CovidGraph project"},{"Description":"Quality and accuracy of information in OpenKG-COVID19 is not continuously ensured","Impact":"Potential dissemination of outdated or incorrect information, leading to confusion and potential harm","Mitigation":"Establish a process for continuous updating and validation of information in OpenKG-COVID19, involve domain experts in data validation","Technologies":"Data validation tools, automated update mechanisms, involvement of domain experts","People":"Researchers, public health professionals, general public","Owner":"OpenKG"}]}
